FILE: cm645750v11.0.txt
DYAD: IRAQ - INDIA
RIVALRY: RIV1238
DISPUTE(S): MID3053 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190311
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190311

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID3053 

TERRMID: MID3053 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3053 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID3053 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID3053 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID3053 from Gibler 2018, in 1984 Iraq bombed an Indian oil tanker. Iraq routinely attacked ships trading with Iran as a way to harm Iran's economy during the Iran-Iraq War. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID3053 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3053 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3053 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3053 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3053 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3053 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3053 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3053 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3053 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3053 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3053 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3053 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
